Text.Page:
Oh, I'm so close! I just need one more piece of the puzzle to crack the mystery here.

You've been so helpful so far. I feel like you should be the one to close this out, don't you? Besides, I have to start sorting these other things you've brought.

If you could collect the final piece from {@LinkCreature:18#105#metatrons}, we can make this discovery together. Sort of.

Yes. YES! This will take some time to decode, but it'll be worth it!

You've contributed so much to my research that I might even credit you when I take it public!

Thank you.

I thought you'd left. You won't find important relics lying around me!

Well, I mean, I suppose you will, but not the ones you're after.
